translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Reversal of the Law🔽The Triad-based Text

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)🔽19.13. Uppannattika🔽Naanuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nauppādī dhammo uppannassa🔽dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Naanuppanno ca nauppādī ca dhammā uppannassa dhammassa🔽hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  uppanna ttika  na anuppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na auppādī dhammaḥ uppannassa  dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na anuppannaḥ ca na auppādī ca dhammā uppannassa dhammassa  hetu paccayena paccayaḥ
translated: The Triad on Arisen🔽An unarisen state is a condition, as root-cause condition, for an arisen state. A non-arising state is a condition, as root-cause condition, for an arisen state. An unarisen and a non-arising state are a condition, as root-cause condition, for an arisen state. (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā satta, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye satta, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe adhipatiyā satta sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi upanissaye satta purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: Three in the root-cause, seven in the object, seven in the predominance, three in the conascence, three in the mutuality, three in the support, seven in the decisive support, three in the prenascence, three in the postnascence, three in the presence, three in the absence, three in the disappearance, three in the non-disappearance, three in the disconnection, three in the disassociation, three in the inconsequence, three in the non-adversion, three in the non-deprivation, three in the nourishment, three in the obstruction, three in the non-obstruction, three in the possession, three in the non-possession, three in the faculty, three in the path, three in the fruit, three in the nibbana, three in the undetermined, three in the past, three in the future, three in the present, three in the unarisen, three in the not-yet-manifested, three in the not-yet-destroyed, three in the signless, three in the desire, three in the concentration, three in the wisdom, three in the deliverance, three in the non-greed, three in the non-hate, three in the non-delusion, three in the investigation, three in the initiative, three in the persistence, three in the serenity, three in the inclination, three in the energy, three in the unification, three in the view, three in the resolve, three in the utterance, three in the knowledge, three in the seeing, three in the path, three in the attainment, three in the fruit, three in the emergence, three in the publication, three in the determination, three in the non-determination, three in the past, three in the future, three in the present, three in the internal, three in the external, three in the internal-external, three in the far, three in the near, three in the far-near.
